item.title: George üê∫
item.description: Funny fact about a cage, they’re never built for just one group El-P Why? Without allowing an outlet for freethinking and creativity we all would go a little mad. I wanted to build a platform where my thoughts could be critiqued, even after I am gone. Assuming GitHub doesn’t go the way of GeoCities, that is. This website does not utilize a Content Delivery Network (CDN), or any type of tracking.

item.title: GMI
